title: Piña colada

ingredients.content: 500 g fresh pineapple, cut into pieces, plus 6 extra wedges for garnishing
100 - 150 g caster sugar, to taste (see Tips)

preparations.content: Place ice cubes, pineapple pieces and sugar into mixing bowl, then blend <b>2 min/speed 5<b>-10, increasing speed gradually from speed 5 to speed 10.<b>
Add coconut milk and Malibu, then mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>.

Spread some desiccated coconut onto a plate. Lightly dampen the rims of 6 hurricane glasses with water, then dip rims into coconut. Divide piña colada between glasses and garnish with a pineapple wedge to serve.

hintsAndTricks: We used Malibu, however you can use a standard white rum in this recipe. You will need to adjust the amount of sugar used accordingly (coconut-flavoured rum is generally a bit sweeter than standard white rum).
